import React,{useRef} from 'react' import classes from './Checkout.module.css' const Checkout = (props) => { const[ormInputValid,setFormInputisValid]=useState[{ name:true, city:true, postal:true, c }] const nameInputRef=useRef() const streetInputRef=useRef() const postalInputRef=useRef() const cityInputRef=useRef() const ConfirmHandler=(event)=> { event.preventDefault() const enteredName=nameInputRef.current.value const enteredStreet=streetInputRef.current.value const enteredPostal=postalInputRef.current.value const enteredCity=cityInputRef.current.value } return (
); } export default Checkout
